hero.welcomeSubtext: Ready to make a difference in your community today?
hero.title: Co-create a
hero.description: Connect with residents, businesses, and local authorities to build stronger, smarter communities. Discover eco-friendly initiatives, share resources, and collaborate on projects that make a real impact.

features.title: Everything You Need for Sustainable Living
features.subtitle: Our platform brings together all the tools and connections you need to create positive environmental and social impact in your community.

marketplace.title: Interactive Marketplace
marketplace.description: Discover and trade sustainable products and services within your community.

community.title: Community Resources
community.description: Share tools, skills, and knowledge to build a stronger circular economy.

events.title: Event Hubs
events.description: Find and organize local events focused on sustainability and collaboration.

projects.title: Project Collaboration
projects.description: Co-create innovative solutions for urban challenges with diverse stakeholders.

security.title: Secure Platform
security.description: Your data and interactions are protected with enterprise-grade security.

mobile.title: Cross-Device Access
mobile.description: Seamless experience across all devices with responsive design.

home.communityHighlightsSubtext: Discover ongoing projects, upcoming events, and sustainable marketplace items

projects.title: Active Community Projects
projects.subtitle: Join ongoing projects that are making a real difference in our community. Collaborate with neighbors, businesses, and local authorities.
projects.noProjectsSubtext: Start a new project to make a difference in your community!

1.title: Community Garden Initiative
1.description: Transform vacant lots into thriving community gardens that provide fresh produce for local families and create green spaces for neighborhoods.

2.title: Smart Recycling Stations
2.description: Install AI-powered recycling stations throughout the city that sort waste automatically and reward residents for proper recycling habits.

3.title: Youth Mentorship Program
3.description: Connect local professionals with youth to provide mentorship, career guidance, and skill development opportunities for the next generation.

4.title: Bike Share Network
4.description: Establish a comprehensive bike-sharing system with electric bikes and smart docking stations to promote sustainable transportation.

5.title: Community Wi-Fi Access
5.description: Provide free, high-speed internet access in public spaces to bridge the digital divide and support remote work and education.

6.title: Local Food Market
6.description: Create a weekly farmers market featuring local producers, artisans, and food vendors to support the local economy and healthy eating.

marketplace.title: Sustainable Community Marketplace
marketplace.description: Discover eco-friendly products, green energy solutions, and sustainable services from local businesses committed to building a better future for our community.
marketplace.beFirst: Be the first to add a sustainable product or service!

0.title: Organic Vegetables Box
0.description: Fresh, locally grown organic vegetables delivered weekly. Support local farmers while eating healthy!

1.title: Solar Panel Installation Kit
1.description: Complete residential solar panel system with inverter and mounting hardware. Reduce your energy bills by up to 80%!

2.title: Wind Turbine - Small Scale
2.description: Perfect for residential use, this compact wind turbine generates clean energy for your home. Easy installation.

3.title: Handmade Pottery Set
3.description: Beautiful ceramic bowls and mugs crafted by local artisans. Perfect for your kitchen or as gifts.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Join local events that bring our community together around sustainability and innovation.
events.checkBack: Check back soon for upcoming community events!

0.title: Community Clean-Up Day
0.description: Join your neighbors for a city-wide clean-up event. We'll provide supplies and refreshments. Let's make our neighborhoods shine!

1.title: Digital Skills Workshop
1.description: Learn essential digital skills including online safety, digital communication, and basic computer literacy. All ages welcome!

2.title: Urban Gardening Masterclass
2.description: Learn how to grow your own food in small spaces. We'll cover container gardening, composting, and seasonal planting tips.

brand.description: Building stronger, smarter, and more connected communities for a sustainable future.

marketplacePage.description: Buy, sell, and trade sustainable goods with your community. From green energy solutions to organic produce, find everything you need for an eco-friendly lifestyle through our circular economy platform.

hero.title: About Symbiotic City
hero.subtitle: Building sustainable communities through collaboration, innovation, and shared responsibility for our planet's future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Symbiotic City empowers communities to take collective action toward sustainability. We believe that when neighbors work together, we can create meaningful environmental impact while building stronger, more resilient communities.
mission.description2: Our platform connects like-minded individuals, facilitates collaborative projects, and creates a marketplace for sustainable living. Together, we're not just changing how we live – we're changing the world.

communityFirst.title: Community First
communityFirst.description: We believe that sustainable change happens when communities come together with shared purpose and mutual support.

environmentalImpact.title: Environmental Impact
environmentalImpact.description: Every action matters. We focus on measurable environmental impact and celebrate both small steps and big achievements.

innovationAction.title: Innovation & Action
innovationAction.description: We embrace creative solutions and empower individuals to turn ideas into action for a more sustainable future.

step1.title: Join the Community
step1.description: Create your profile, share your interests, and connect with neighbors who share your sustainability goals.

step2.title: Participate & Collaborate
step2.description: Join existing projects, attend events, or start your own initiatives. Trade and share resources through our marketplace.

step3.title: Make Impact
step3.description: Track your environmental impact, celebrate achievements, and inspire others to join the movement for change.

sarahChen.name: Sarah Chen
sarahChen.description: Environmental scientist passionate about community-driven sustainability solutions.

marcusJohnson.name: Marcus Johnson
marcusJohnson.description: Full-stack developer with expertise in building scalable community platforms.

lisaRodriguez.name: Lisa Rodriguez
lisaRodriguez.description: Community organizer dedicated to fostering meaningful connections and collaboration.

callToAction.title: Ready to Join the Movement?
callToAction.description: Be part of a community that's actively working toward a sustainable future. Together, we can create lasting change.
